name: Crostini with Pear, Parmesan, and Caramelized Shallots
author: KerriJ
summary: Yummy crostini recipe created by my friend with some additional tweaks added by me. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, divided, or to taste
2 large shallots, chopped, or more to taste
1  firm Bartlett pear, chopped, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat butter and 1 teaspoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in shallots
Cook and stir until golden brown, about 8 minutes
Transfer to a bowl and let cool, 20 to 25 minutes
Combine pears, 1 teaspoon olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper with the shallots; stir until evenly mixed
Cover and refrigerate shallot mixture for about 2 hours
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Rub with garlic and brush with 1 teaspoon olive oil
Toast in the preheated oven until golden, 8 to 10 minutes
Top baguette rounds with shallot mixture and Parmesan cheese
Return crostini to oven and broil until golden and bubbly, 1 to 2 minutes
